answers.answer: I am pregnant with baby number 4 and I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes around 28 weeks.   I never had it before.   Prior to that, I had an ultrasound because they said I was measuring too small.   Now with the diabetes im measuring 3 weeks ahead.   Im 36 weeks now.  It's been a roller coaster ride.   Hope all works out for you.

question: I'm freaking out! I am 33w 5d today and I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes a few weeks ago. So now I get weekly ultrasounds and today I had one and they said I had too much fluid around the baby. My doctor is making me do another fasted glucose test and then checking the fluid level again on Wednesday. He said if it is still hight they will have to induce me next week. I am so nervous!  I don't want to have her too early and this feels so early. Have any other moms out there experienced anything like this?
title: gestational diabetes and amniotic fluid
